titleStmt.title: The late speech and testimony of William Gogor one of the three desperate and incorrigible traytors execute [sic] at the Grass Mercat in Edinburgh, the eleventh day of March, 1681, for disowning His Sacred Majesties authority ...
titleStmt.author: Gogor, William, d. 1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.B. and sold by W. Davies,

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1886 as Wing (2nd ed.) G1006A.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
